Public NotInheritable Class SecurityPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SecurityPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

summary.span: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 执行安全操作。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不再支持部分受信任的代码。Partially trusted code is no longer supported. 此属性在 .NET Core 中不起作用。This attribute has no effect in .NET Core. 允许的声明的范围取决于所 使用的。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 安全特性声明的安全信息存储在属性目标的元数据中，由系统在运行时进行访问。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 对于命令性安全，请使用相应的权限类。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class. 使用 类时，请在 "安全" 操作中使用权限 () 请求的权限。When you use the class, follow the security action with the permission(s) that are being requested. 可以请求的每个安全权限（在枚举中定义） 在类中都有相应的属性 。Each security permission that can be requested, as defined in the enumeration, has a corresponding property in the class. 例如，若要请求访问非托管代码的能力，请遵循所请求的属性设置的 demand 语句，如下所示： `SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, UnmanagedCode=true)` 。For example, to demand the ability to access unmanaged code, follow the demand statement with the property setting that is being requested, as follows: `SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, UnmanagedCode=true)`. > [!NOTE] > 枚举与属性之间的等效性的例外 是， 枚举值由 从类) 继承 (属性表示 。An exception to the equivalence between the enumeration and the properties is that the enumeration value is represented by the property (inherited from the class). 若要要求所有安全权限，请指定 `Unrestricted=true` 。To demand all security permissions, specify `Unrestricted=true`.

span.span: Extending Metadata Using Attributes

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限允许重定向已统一的 .NET Framework 程序集以及在 .NET Framework 外部找到的其他程序集。This permission allows redirection of .NET Framework assemblies that have been unified, as well as other assemblies found outside the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission CreatePermission() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreatePermission () As IPermission

span.span: Creates and returns a new .
A that corresponds to this attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应仅由安全系统调用，而不是由应用程序代码调用。This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code. 在编译时，特性将安全声明转换为元数据中的序列化格式。At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata. 元数据中的声明性安全数据是根据此方法返回的与此属性对应的权限创建的。Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.

member this.Execution : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否声明了执行代码的权限。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether permission to execute code is declared.

value.span: 如果声明了执行代码的权限，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if permission to execute code is declared; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对 程序集级别的权限请求被忽略。A demand for permission at the assembly level is ignored. 如果程序集有权执行， 则会自动授予权限，并将属性设置 为 `true` 或 `false` 不起作用。If an assembly has the right to execute, permission is automatically granted, and setting the property to either `true` or `false` has no effect.

span.span: One or more of the values combined using a bitwise OR.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 这是一种功能强大的权限，只应授予给高度受信任的代码。This is a powerful permission that should be granted only to highly trusted code.
